'''Peach Palm Wood''' is a type of [[Wood]] that is obtained by cutting down Peach Palm Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
Peach Palm Trees seem to grow in areas related to the ancient [[dragon]] civilization, such as [[The Upper Sanctum]], [[Atocpan]], and the [[Ancient Sacred Mountain]].

For specific locations, see the Official Interactive Map for [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=644 Teyvat] and [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/36?shown_types=644 Ancient Sacred Mountain], respectively.
